Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.desc: Rare footage from the JFK Presidential Library and an interview with Ronald Reagan detail the astounding presidency of John F. Kennedy, from his inaugural speech to his tragic death by assassination on Nov. 22, 1963.

programme.title: Marilyn Monroe: Fascination

programme.desc: David Hathaway has been preaching the gospel throughout Russia, Europe and Israel for over 70 years. He has seen the power of God from the beginning of his ministry, and wants to keep the fire going.

programme.title: Hagee Ministries
programme.desc: Pastors John and Matt Hagee of Hagee Ministries in San Antonio, TX, deliver messages from God's Word, proclaiming the bold truth of His promises.

programme.title: Allen Jackson Ministries
programme.desc: Pastor Allen Jackson brings a Biblical perspective to the ever-changing world, encouraging believers to lead with their faith in every arena - no matter what shaking the season may bring.

programme.title: God TV Together
programme.desc: GOD TV Together offers daily encouragement and hope in your walk with the Lord. Be inspired and equipped as the team and their guests bring you insight, wisdom and testimonies of the Goodness of God.

programme.title: Amazing Facts With Doug Batchelor
programme.desc: President of Amazing Facts, Pastor Doug Batchelor explores the Bible in a whole new way, offering guidance on Christian living, prophecy, and presenting Biblical answers to many of life's questions.

programme.title: Pastor Ramiro Pena
programme.desc: Pastor Ramiro Peña of Christ the King Church in Waco, TX, delivers powerful and anointed messages that aim to encourage and inspire the listener as they experience the power of God in their own lives.

programme.title: James River TV
programme.desc: Led by John and Debbie Lindell, James River Church in Ozark, Missouri, loves to welcome people into God's family, with the firm belief that there is no limit to what God can do in people's lives.

programme.title: Jerusalem Dateline
programme.desc: CBN News Middle East Bureau Chief Chris Mitchell reports on the latest events and how they impact Israel and the stability of the Middle East.

programme.title: Creflo Dollar
programme.desc: Dr. Creflo Dollar ministers to all walks of life with hope for change. With a renewal of faith, mind, and spirit, He and his wife Taffi share their vision for all to understand God's love and promises.

programme.title: Miracles Now with Brian Bolt
programme.desc: A witness to the miracle-working power of God. Faith will be encouraged to impact the world through the power of the Holy Spirit.

programme.title: Andrew Wommack: Gospel Truth
programme.desc: Teaching on God's unconditional love and grace from the founder of Andrew Womack Ministries and Charis Bible College in Colorado.

programme.title: Joyce Meyer Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.desc: Joyce Meyer, author and one of the world's leading Bible teachers, gives encouragement and advice to help people enjoy daily life.

programme.title: God TV Together
programme.desc: GOD TV Together offers daily encouragement and hope in your walk with the Lord. Be inspired and equipped as the team and their guests bring you insight, wisdom and testimonies of the Goodness of God.

programme.title: Daniel: Does God Reign?
programme.desc: David Ingall visits a medieval cathedral and talks to his mum about a family tragedy. Exploring the book of Daniel by focusing on what it says about Jesus.

programme.title: Band and Preachers
programme.desc: Stephan Christiansen from Jesus Revolution is joined by a team of different preachers and worship leaders for an unscripted and inspirational discussion, praise, and prayer session.

programme.title: Media Missionary
programme.desc: GOD TV extends the invitation to impact the globe with the Gospel from one's own home by becoming a Media Missionary; bringing the Good News of Jesus Christ to every tribe and tongue by way of Media.

programme.title: Heart of David Conference
programme.desc: Rick Pino talks about the journey of recognising and facilitating the presence of God.

programme.title: It Is Written
programme.desc: "It Is Written" has been a staple on American television since premiering in 1956. The weekly program, currently hosted by John Bradshaw, applies timeless truths to everyday life, with many episodes dealing with issues such as loneliness, fear, low self-esteem and spiritual principles. With its straightforward, uplifting presentations, the program aims to inspire and encourage people of all faiths and creeds. Founded by George Vandeman, "It Is Written" was the first religious telecast to air in color.

The weekly program, currently hosted by John Bradshaw, applies timeless truths to everyday life, with many episodes dealing with issues such as loneliness, fear, low self-esteem and spiritual principles. With its straightforward, uplifting presentations, the program aims to inspire and encourage people of all faiths and creeds. Founded by George Vandeman, "It Is Written" was the first religious telecast to air in color.
